title.rendered: NEMTEK ELECTRIC FENCE LIGHT – STAINLESS STEEL

content.rendered:
The fence light intensity changes with the voltage on the fence. The lower the voltage the lower the light intensity. It is installed between the earth and live wire to indicate the status and condition of the fence for peace of mind.

Features:

  • Indicates power on the fence for peace of mind
  • No batteries required
  • Uses minimal power from the fence
  • The brightness of the LEDs will depend on the voltage on the fence. Only two of the four LEDs will illuminate if the fence voltage is low
  • Highly visible LEDs allow for a 160-degree viewing angle. This allows the light to shine into the secure area only
  • Can operate from 0.9kV to 12kV
